content.detailedDescription:
I live in alamance nc just south of burlington.  back of house faces ne father, daughter and myself were sitting down to july 4th dinner on pool patio out back. time was around 8:10 pm. sky clear blue with very small, very few low scattered clouds. father saw bright round object stationary almost directly overhead. i quickly recognized that this wasn't a plane or meteor. i ran into house to get sony handycam to film and called my wife, stepmother and daughter's boyfriend outside to witness.

object still overhead but slowly moving after 5 stationary minutes.  moved in a east se to a north nw direction. object distance seemed very high and higher than passenger jets with jetstreams.  filming was shaky as it was hand held with some filming with my arms on table for some support object distance was very high which made filming seem more shaky.  2nd problem was that its a new camera and i was not familiar with the auto focus and how to turn it off while i filmed and fought trying to manually focus.

object was stationary overhead for 5 minutes and then traveled for 20-25 minutes spanning from 90 degrees overhead to about 45 degrees from horizon with occasional wispy clouds but mostly blue sky as film will show. i did put the camera down once to view through my night optics goggles which wasn't very successful in the light.  picking back up the handycam, the object was still in the sky and then i got the suprise that my daughter could visually see.  please excuse the couple of curse words i said in my excitement in the film.

object then seemed to release a smaller object around the 8 oclock position, that i was able to view, go out and up visually.  i then looked back in my view finder to see 2 more objects coming down out of the emission and the lower one then separated into 2.  after i lost sight in my camera screen of the objects i looked up and they were not visible  however i saw a dark jet flying about 2000 ft up but in the distance and could not hear the engines but did not record it as i remained searching for the objects.   film is condensed as i edited out the very shaky and blurred parts.  i checked and there were no rocket launches from wallops island or canaveral nor could i find any high altitude balloon launches recently either.  your thoughts would be appreciated.  total sighting lasted 35 minutes approximately.
content.summary: Father saw object overhead stationary, ran in house for handycam and filmed object emitted 4 smaller objects 1 went up and 2 down with one separating into 2.

content.detailedDescription: This video was taken on an iphone 6 in avon, ohio looking south towards north ridgeville on july 4th. 2015.  we first noticed 2 objects hanging low right over the tree line.  they ascended quickly higher in the sky, only to disappear.  it was taken right after the fireworks were over at crushers stadium.  this was the only one we could catch on video, but we saw a total of 6.  they would fade out, then seem to reappear elsewhere.  these were certainly not stars as we could easily discern the difference.  the blinking of the object is ruled out as clouds passing due to the lack of clouds.  we saw 6 over the period of an hour.  it almost seemed like they knew we were filming them.  we tried to get a good look through a telescope but were unable to do so.  we also saw a triangular shape through binoculars that had several colors including blue, green, orange, red, yellow and white.  it was shaped like a triangle when viewed through the binoculars.  it seemed like they may have been upset with the fireworks, i just had this strange feeling like that was why they were there.  it also seemed like at times they were mimicking the lights of the fireworks in order to camouflage themselves.N  in the video, the object moves slowly, then flickers and fades out.
content.summary: Triangular shaped through binoculars, round red/orange ball/multi colored at times - saw several objects that disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was at the trailor and was walking down a path and heard people say look at that in the sky and when i looked up i seen a triangle shaped ship that was about a half mile long there were about 5 lights in the front of the ufo with one light towards the end of the ufo the lights that were on the ufo were round and white and they were morphing kinda and moving real fasting couldn't believe what i was seeing and there was a lot of people just watching this thing there was actually a band playing they stopped there music to look at the ufo it was so crazy it was in the air for about 4 or 5 minutes then it just disappeared just like that no sound no nothing i always watch these shows on tv and to actually see one in real life was just crazy i'm still shocked and kinda feel weird about knowing there are mile long objects in our sky i didn't have my phone on me but a lot of people took pictures and videos of this object
content.summary: Easiest way to explain it was the phoniex lights it was unreal it really was all i can say is wow i seen a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
it was 4th of july and fireworks were being set off by the neighbors to the north of us across the canal. my daughter was on the lanai watching, and called me to come out of the house when she noticed something unusual in the sky. the first thing we thought of was that it might be the expected alignment of venus and ?(another planet),however the objects we were looking at were too large to be stars. further, they were located in northern sky (i think the alignment was to be seen in the west?). we could also tell the objects were definitely not part of the fireworks display. 
     to the left of the fireworks was a stationary (hovering?) horizontal rectangle with lights rapidly skipping across it. the movement of the lights seemed random. the colors were predominately orange and yellow and a bright white and maybe a dark color in between. to the left of this ufo was a smaller orb, more rounded in shape and its color was a dull red. when i first saw them, both objects were stationary and they remained so for about five minutes. 
     i suggested my daughter get her phone and take a picture. when she went inside, the objects began a slow movement to the left (west). they were still moving west when she returned. she was unable to get a photo and went back inside for her ipad. she returned and was still unable to get a picture. both objects were still slowly moving west. the smaller object appeared to fade out after a few moments. perhaps it went behind a cloud and the larger object followed it and disappeared.
     initially, we both thought they might be helicopters, but they didn't look right. my daughter called the police station to see if any of their choppers were flying and she was told there were no helicopters flying this night.
content.summary: Two ufo's, one with lights pulsating, the other to it's left was  a dull red orb

content.detailedDescription: It was my daughter that took the photos. trying to get a picture of the sunset through the tree outside the front of her house.  she took several photos. she did not see the object until she looked at the photos. it appeared in four different photos.  at first i brushed it off as a reflection, but then i saw all four photos and thought otherwise. and she said she didn't even see that image until she saw if in the picture. the same configuration, different locations, and with an orb around the green object.
content.summary: The same configuration, different locations, and with an orb around the green object.

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th 2015 returning from a firework show in downtown, traveling east on the 10 fwy near east l.A. looking in a s-se direction what appeared to be 3 lights (triangle) that at first appeared to be hovering, but as we headed east at about 30-40 mph, it did appear to be moving going to the west. it remained south of the 10 fwy.  since there were a lot of fireworks occurring, there was a lot of smoke in the air.  we (my wife and i) could not see any surface only 3 lights that seemed to stay relatively equidistant from each other.  just playing devil's advocate, it could have been flares attached to balloons with some thin rigid material to keep a resemblance of a structure.  but they didn't drop to the ground mainly hovered and glided heading west.  my wife took a picture, but said nothing showed up.
content.summary: July 4th 2015 east l.A.

content.detailedDescription: I was out with 2 other friends of mine they saw it too and isnt the only time we encountered something like that ...We were out talking and at a moment i felt something to look up i dont know the most of the times that happens to look in the sky without a reason i see a undendified fliyng object ..Anyway i looked in the sky it was night by the way and i saw two small lights in the back and one big in front of them triangle shaped ..It was big because i saw the lights was moving together i told that to my friends they was amazed and they told me why everytime i look up i see something
content.summary: In this area ive saw a lot of strange lights lately i dont know what are they ..Some are blue some are with a lot of small lights in circle and one big in midle and some just bright that you can see only the light ive saw one triungular shape too

content.detailedDescription: I was playing with my sony cx220 modified to full spectrum camera with infra red around 22:30 pm at night on 1st july 2015, while looking threw the viewfinder while videoing i seen this white light shoot downwards and felt it was heading towards me. i first though it was something unusual as there was no sound at all from it and though it moved too fast for it to be a plane. it first dived down towards me then vanished then a bit later on it re-appears in the sky and flickered then disappeared again and then re-appeared elsewhere in the sky. i felt a little nervous and excited at same time as seeing ufos here is very rare. i lost sight of the object as it just vanished into thin air.
content.summary: Ufo descended from sky downwards and seemed to head towards me then reappears in sky above me

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting

in july of 1957, i was going through the celestial part of air force navigator training. one night, i was taking practice celestial shots. the exact date escapes me, but it was in july well before the soviets had launched sputnik.

there were celestial navigation trainers in the paved quadrangle, small enclosures with astrodomes on them. each cadet would hang a sextant from an astrodome. the sextant for use in an aircraft must have an artificial horizon because inside an aircraft there is no actual horizon except that in the cockpit. a bubble was needed to create the artificial horizon in the manner of a carpenter's level, so an aerial sextant was usually referred to as a "bubble sextant". because aircraft that are flying are usually bouncing or careening slightly during a celestial shot, these sextants have averagers built into them. one puts the crosshairs of the sextant on a star that appears to be inside the bubble and uses a little dial to keep the crosshairs on the star for two minutes in which the averager is doing its job.

prior to taking each shot, the student navigator must precompute the elevation and azimuth of the star he wishes to shoot. these figures are used to aim the sextant in the precise direction and elevation for the star. so when the student looks into the sextant eyepiece, he sees a field of view in which there should be one star that is brighter than the others in the field. he then assumes that he has the correct star to shoot and sets the sextant crosshairs on that star.

that night my first shot was to be on kochab, the 2.2 magnitude star at the lip of the little dipper (ursa minor). i made my precomps inside the dorm and went out to the navigation trainer with a flashlight and my precomps. there were two other cadets in the trainer doing their precomps by flashlight while i put the sextant up and set the azimuth and elevation.

when i put my eye on the sextant eyepiece, there was a bright star in the field just as there should be, so i waited until the precise time for the shot according to my precomp. i began the shot and was adjusting the elevation as the averager was ticking away. the "star" i was shooting held firm with other stars in the field for about half a minute. then i noticed that the azimuth and elevation were changing in excess of what was usual and could see that the supposed star was changing location relative to the other stars in the field. i took my eye from the eyepiece and watched the "star" slowly moving to the right and slightly downward in relation to the other stars.

the two other cadets in the trainer were still precomputing for a shot. i tried to show them the "star", but they could not easily see it among the other stars and it was moving too slowly for them to notice it easily - so they lost interest quickly and never saw what i was attempting to show them. i was not excited because nothing exciting seemed to be happening. consequently, the other cadets went back to what they had been doing.

i watched the "star" continuing to move for a distance of about ten degrees across the sky (perhaps it was less) and then it stopped and just stayed in place with the other stars once more. i continued to watch the "star" for several minutes and checked its location again before i left the trainer (at least a half hour later). the object never moved again during this time relative the other stars.

i thought about this for some time. i never reported it. this was before there was ever even a sputnik. later, in the air force, i learned of many ufo sightings that were never reported (reporting them was unwise at the time), and i began to think that what i had seen was a "mother ship" changing its solar orbit. had it been in earth orbit it would have been moving all the time. a synchronous earth orbit is possible, but not where that "star" was.

i have a bachelor of science degree in general engineering and numerous post grad courses. i have been an air force navigator, private pilot, and engineer among other things.

i would prefer that my name be kept out of this if it is published anywhere.
content.summary: "star" seen thru 1.5 bubble sextant and by eye - moved from one place to another. stayed there.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside just as getting dark, looked up  and saw large dark gray gunmetal colored triangle craft  of huge size aprox 1/2 acre wide x 20 ft tall hovering over my property. it made absolutely no sound nor did it have any lights, i looked away momentarily questioning what i had just seen, in all of about 4 seconds time when i looked up it completely disappeared without a sound. i wish to remain anonymous. i had the impression this was a military craft of immense size and capabilities.
content.summary: 1/2 acre wide x20 ft tall dark gray gunmetal colored hovering triangle craft

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving east on the highway just outside of calgary i don't remember the exact time but as we were driving i noticed something over the highway really low maybe 20 ft up. it was travelling the same spead as our car then it started to slow and i said it is slowing down for us. i was
really curious as to what it was and so it slowed down then stopped and we drove right underneath it. i looked up through the windshield and could see this thing from underneath. it was really huge , the size of a football
field and i could make out the underside of this thing. there were no windows or anything like that. this was in 1969 so a very long time ago.
i wanted to get a better look at it and asked my husband to pull over so i could get out and have a better look so we did. i opened the car and got out and it took off at lightning speed sw at. i could see it off in the distance just sitting there. we looked for a few min and then got into our car and headed back down the road. there was a big rightup in the calgary herald a week later saying that there were 8 sightings that same day. i have never seen one since like that and probably never will but they are real. that's pretty much it.
content.summary: Followed car and then we drove right underneath it could see it from front windshield

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking out trash and looked up to the east towards mingus mt..  the object was higher than the mt.  it was rotating on a vertical axis.  it appeared to be a 2 dimensional object.  with width and height but no depth from my perspective.  one side was bright metallic red and the opposite side was flat black.  i did not flutter.  it rotated apparently in a  smooth motion on it's vertical axis with no apparent variation in speed and disappeared  into an approaching thunder storm..

this is my companion's recollection.  

i came outside and was told to look at that.  i observed a shiny metallic red object in the sky.  it seemed to float back and forth on its axis against the wind.  the object seemed to defy the wind in that it stayed in the same area without going into the clouds or being blown away.  at first i thought it was a plastic bag, but most plastic bags are no all red in color.   the object  moved just enough to make me realize that this could be a ufo.  since it wasn't going anywhere.   as the clouds blew past, the object stayed in the same place but moving just enough for me to see the shininess of it.  i kept my eyes fixated on the object until it suddenly disappeared into the clouds moving into the blowing clouds.  it had to be a ufo.  what else could it have been?
content.summary: Rectanguler object on it's long vertical axis appearing to be bright metallic red on one side and flat black on the other side.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine came over after her classes around 3:30 pm. around about 8:40 pm she was going to head home. so i walked her to her car to see her off. we were standing by her car saying our goodbyes when a bright star to the east caught my eye and i said to her "jebus that star is bright", she thought it was one of our planets. then we both noticed a white flashing below the position of the star/planet we were looking at, moving south-east. i asked her "whats that right there?" and pointed. she replies "a plane maybe?". but the white flashing was different from the white strobe lighting on typical aircraft. the things white pulse went (flash-white pause flash-white cont.) and from what i have seen on conventional aircraft the white pulse they put off goes (flash-white twice rapid succession pause flash-white once cont.) but anyway as this thing was starting to move over head we could then make out 3 solid orange circular lights in a triangle around the pulsing white light. then as it kept coming in our direction and was almost 90 degrees off the horizon over head the pulsing light changed in color and succession red green and white now but much faster pulsing and seemingly at random intervals. i turned to her and said "yeah, i don't think that's a plane". so we walked up my front yard to keep watching this thing move away from us now, because the trees in my yard and neighbors we obstructing our view.

all of that ^ happened within 3 or 4 minutes so the thing was moving quick.

now were standing in my yard and not in the street by her car and i am still watching this thing move to the se. then she points out to me there are two more to the sw. 1 of them was a streaking solid white light that seemed to just go out seconds after she pointed them out, and the other was another pulsing red green white randomly those colors both moving nw. i can not stress enough the seemingly random pattern of the pulsing red white and green. it was like (red red white green white red green red white) no order to them that i could tell of. so now we are watching this other pulsing move nw and behind my neighbors tree again so back into the street to watch we went. after watching this one move away to the nw for another just handful of minutes i scanned the skies behind me because my curiosity is peaked. right bloody there behind us was our original 3 pulsing colors and 3 solid circular orange lighting triangular craft. still moving as quick as before but now its also moving nw, just on my east. so now were watching this one again and as it is moving away from us. then the thing turned on a really bright cone of light that rotated 45 or 90 degrees from its right side to the front of it and then turned off. but it was so fast it was hard to tell how much the light rotated. the cone light was brighter and more prominent than the other lights but the cone light did not interrupt the pulsing or orange lights.

there is plenty more story cause we observed these things for about an hour and a half and all that above was about 20 minutes of that experience. i was thinking you guys might find this interesting and possibly look into radar and what not if you are interested. 


thank you
content.summary: 5-6 triangles and or orbs, moving randomly in a large rectangular/triangular flight path over north-west city section

content.detailedDescription:
On 28 june 2015 at about 5pm my family and i departed from richmond hill ga, on our long road trip to colorado springs co, where i will be stationed as an active duty army senior nco. prior to leaving i bought a brand new gps navigation unit and we tested it out in town prior to our trip knowing it worked well. our navigation unit directed us toward augusta ga. our kids fell asleep at about 9pm. 
at precisely 01:28am 29 june 2015 on hwy 1 south heading north approximately 7-8 miles south of a gas station at 10525 hwy 1 south, wadley ga 30477. our radio began to get real static so i turned it down when my wife noticed a very large object flying left to right coming toward us. i looked up to the left and hit my brakes stopping our truck to the side of the road. the object appeared to be approximately 250 meters in length 60 meters in height and was approximately flying 200 feet in altitude and was spurting sparks from the rear of the object. the sparks were jetting out about 50-80 meters in a pattern of controlling thrust. 
my wife and i had a very good look at the object closer than anyone else on that highway considering there was no vehicles in sight. the object had a dim glow of a orange around it, vague but noticeable. the objects exterior was metallic but appeared to look like oil on water effect to it and appeared to be fluid like movement over the metallic body of the object. the moon and nearby clouds gave us a good look at the body of the object. my wife and i watched in disbelief in what we were witnessing as it moved left to right the object decreased in altitude as it was over the highway and us in our truck then began to increase in altitude after it crossed the highway right overhead of us. we watched as it increased in altitude and penetrated some clouds and accelerated out of sight through the cloud cover quickly.
 i got back on the road and proceeded down the highway way feeling a bit shook up with a mild headache trying debunk what it might have been. too fast for a blimp but was the closest man made aircraft in comparison, too slow for airplanes, no sound but mild humming, too big to be any aircraft or helicopter, and so on. about 4-5 miles further up the road a semi truck had stopped on the side of the road on the southbound lanes and a car with a guy getting back in their car as they saw what we saw. i stopped at the first gas station on the right and told the guy there what we saw and bought a few things to proceed on our road trip. an hour later our navigation system malfunctioned telling us we were at our final destination in the middle of nowhere at a church. my wife mentioned that we have been driving 9 hours which seamed to me to be a long time for the amount distance we cover. i stopped and powered it down and reset it to colorado springs. we got back on track and we stopped to sleep in north atlanta area just after 6am. my stomach was upset and i did not sleep well nor did my wife. 
we got up late afternoon and got back on the road. 6 hours after being on the road my trucks transmission began acting up and we had stopped. i messed around with changing my trucks transmission settings through all the functions for about 15 minutes and it eventually corrected itself. i have had on an off headaches and upset stomach since witnessing this object. my truck has been acting odd as well, check engine oil level, check engine, and a large chip in the windshield not noticed before.
i have receipts and time lines available and i can include a drawing of the object. i am capable of drawing and painting a visual representation of what we saw but my art supplies are packed away until we find a home to buy so i’m limited as to what i can do for the time being. the image of that object is vivid in my mind to good detail so i will produce a visual reference at a later time. i’m unsure what the object was and i am not one for jumping to conclusions. i consider all possibilities and i rely on facts before assumptions. our experience is what it is, and could or could not be in relations to one another. i would rather provide more information than not enough information of the event. there is no such thing as too much information.
please keep in mind i am active duty military i’m speaking of this only because i have not yet been told not to and i have not been forced to sign non disclosure orders as i have been forced to in the past. my mos has  presented me with more than a few of incidents in similar situations. i have always had been approached and forced to sign the nondisclosure orders. if you need anything else someone needs to get here and talk to me soon.
thanks!
content.summary: Large object spurting sparklike thrusts passover hwy 1 with a metalic body and fluid like oil slick color passed overhead west to east desending then assending as it excelerated out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Giving all the other triangle sightings stories i have read throughout the years after the event, this is just another classic case of triangle sightings. low, slow and silent. read anyway when interested. :)

it was on a school yard with two friends on a chilly evening in '94. we were just hanging out that night. my friends were standing directly under a light by the schools' entrance while i was standing in the middle of the (elementary) schools' square. i was having a glance at the sky because it was very bright that night. 
i was only looking up for minutes, maybe even seconds when something caught my attention in the right corner of my eye. the first split-second it was like a big moving dark "blind spot" against the stars and it was already as good as directly above me when i got my focus.
to my amazement i saw this very -in my view- exotic looking triangle which immediately seemed to be in total control, unlike the fact that it seemed to be moving too slow to even stay in the air. 
three dull red lights on each corner and the obvious outline of a solid triangle-shaped object.
it wasn't scary but i was definitely shocked and intimidated by its "sudden" appearance. too close and too low. also way too silent for comfort. i can't even help but to think they must have seen me looking and pointing at them.
i think it took about a total of 20 seconds before it disappeared behind the building at the end of the street i was looking into. 
the way it seemed to move at that speed seemed impossible. so steady and straight. i couldn't hear any sound besides the obvious screaming of my own voice calling my friends to come and look. they came running but too late to be able to pick it up. coming directly away from under the light too i suppose. that was and still kind of is frustrating but it doesn't really matter. i have great eyesight and i like to think i am a rational person. i saw whatever i saw that night.
i only told my family at first because i didn't feel like it sounded very believable, especially in those days. in 2015 for some reason it sounds more believable.
i'm not even sure if my friends totally believed me. i don't doubt they believed i saw something. i just think it's easier to believe your own eyes than someone else's.


in the first years after the event i was convinced that it wasn't "ours". it just didn't seem possible in the laws of physics as we humans know it or like in my case at that time: as i was used to seeing flying objects.
now years later i just think it is most likely ours and that we as a species are not to be underestimated in the (terrible) things we are capable of. even if it is just hiding the inevitable source of energy we are so clearly ready for. that is if we want to save our planet. 
and also to be the first intelligent species in the history of the universe to make it past the ten million years of existence mark. if that theory is correct.

anyway, in conclusion. our town is stretched out and about 3-4 miles long. it flew over at pretty much the center of the "long side" at the time i saw it. around 22pm. thats why i think there must be more people around here that have seen it that evening.
that people still see them today means these triangles can 
also (still) fly over us without even being seen, let alone identified.
content.summary: Black triangle with three dull red lights flying over at night. very low, slow and silent.

content.detailedDescription: This was late october, hunting season.  it was dusk.  the sun was low on the western horizon.  i was staying in my camper in the trees.  after dinner, i took a cup of coffee and walked out to the main dirt road, about one hundred (100), yards away, out of the trees.  this is a fairly isolated place in the wind river mountains, about thirty (30) miles northwest of south pass, wyoming.  there are high, granite peaks to the north that stretch all the way up to yellowstone.  farson, the closest hamlet, is about sixty (60) miles to the west-southwest.      it was a cloudless evening; very beautiful sunset.  a movement in the sky caught my attention and i looked up and saw a cylinder tumbling across the sky, end-over-end.  it was gray to dull silver in base color but shown gold-red as it reflected the sunlight.  it had a ratio of about eight-to-one (8 to 1), diameter to length and seemed to have a raised rim of some kind on one end, about a sixth of the way along it's axis.  at first my mind could not grasp what i was seeing and i thought, `well, it must be a booster stage from a rocket.'   only later did i recognize that if it were a booster rocket, it would have crashed into the ground and from its apparent size, it would have been at least five hundred (500) feet in length.  to my knowledge, no one has ever built a booster rocket of that size.     i observed it moving from the south-southeast to the north-northeast.  it never deviated its course.  it never altered its altitude.  it simply tumbled end-over-end as it moved across a blue, evening sky. then it disappeared over the mountains.         i made no notes of my sighting that evening but rather went to bed early as i planned on hunting the next morning.  the strange thing was, that night, i had a nightmare that terrified me.  i do not use the word `terrify' lightly.  i never have nightmares but this one scared me as i have never been scared before or since.  in it, something came over my camp and hovered.  in the dream, i knew `they', (whoever `they are'), were coming.  and i thought, `now wait.  they can't do that!  there are more people in the campground a half a mile away.  they'll be seen.'  but never-the-less, they stopped over my camper and shined an ultra bright light down on it, bathing the whole area around my camper for fifty (50) feet.  then two entities appeared outside my door.  they were dressed in tight fitting suits, like the old usher uniforms that people use to wear in movie theaters and they had on rimless caps of a dark gray color.  i couldn't keep them out....   and that's all i remember.  a few days later i made some notes on this dream and my observation.  i haven't been able to find those notes so a few years ago, i wrote out what i remembered, one more time.  i have never had a dream like that again.  i have never had another sighting of any kind.
content.summary: Sighted cylinder at dusk.  tumbling end-over-end and moving southeast to northwest.  it never altered its course or altitude. disappeared over mountains.

content.detailedDescription: It was 4th of july and several people and myself were watching some local fireworks in front of my property somewhere around 9:20pm. at one point the fireworks were at a lull and someone pointed out the object in the sky traveling in a straight line north to nw. it stood out because of its odd speed and movement and steady reddish orange glow. no blinking lights, no sound, and it certainly was not fireworks of any kind. it moved across the sky and i managed to take video of the object as it travelled. this was no plane or helicopter; i see them all the time and this did not look like or move anything like that. the lights seemed to glow but not blink. through my phone camera viewer the lights appear to almost pulsate and change color. the person who spotted the object happens to be a seasoned veteran in the army who also wasn't sure what it could have been.  i have seen plenty planes and helicopters in the sky nearby due to our proximity to ft. bragg military base-but nothing like this.  the object disappeared from might sight in under a minute behind some houses.
content.summary: Red colored sphere spotted traveling at odd speed across the sky. no blinking lights. reddish in color. t

content.detailedDescription:
During the evening of july 3, 2015, i was sitting outside in the backyard with my daughter and her friend talking. i happened to look up at the sky behind my daughter and saw this orange coloured object flying overhead across the evening sky.
  
i immediately told them both to look at this and for my daughter to grab her phone and see if she could somehow film this object.....We all knew, this was definately not a plane or anything we know of.  we all sort of were shocked and came to the same conclusion this was not a regular plane.
luckily she did manage to capture a few seconds of this object before it passed over our rooftops and we could no longer see it.  (recording time was 9:28 pm)
the object was a bright orangish ball that flew very quickly with deliberation over the sky past our rooftops.  although it was very high up, it was still a good size, bigger than a star that you would see in the skies.
we were all quite shocked and very excited, wondering if this was infact a ufo...I dont believe it was a meteor, this object was very quick and seemed to have a directional purpose.  video attached
content.summary: Bright orange coloured object flew across the sky in a very directional line.

content.detailedDescription: Girlfriend and i went for an nice winter walk on my birthday. we started walking back to our appartment, that's when we looked up because we heard an pulsating noise. what we seen was an large teardrop shaped craft moving at an slow pace of speed and then the craft was almost at the end of our street. that's when i spoke out aloud to my girlfriend and said "do you think what i think that this could be an intelligent being from another planet."  at the same time, i was thinking the same thing that i just said. that's when the craft did an weird movement and turned around and landed. between 25-30 feet away from us. at this point, my girlfriend and i are scared shitless and couldn't move. at this point, its going through my mind that i´m scared and that they don't mean us any harm cause i don't mean them any harm or it any harm. then suddenly,there was an bright blinding white light. i couldn't tell which part of the craft it was coming from because i couldn't see. then as suddenly as the light came on,it was off. it took me an few seconds to see properly, but when i could see ,there before us suddenly was three human like beings. they were all very tall and it appeared to be two males and one female,but i can´t be sure. their hair was very long and blondish white and their features such as their eyes,lips ,nose and ears appeared to be human like but but at the same time not . their skin was so white, it was like milk. their eyes were an brilliant pale blue . i started to think to myself , that me and my girlfriend were going to die. all of an sudden ,something strange started to happen to me . it feels like they are reading my thoughts from childhood until now like an book. i found out later that my girlfriend went through the same thing like i did. anyhow, like i was saying, they were reading my thoughts and feelings like an book. towards the end of them reading me, i hear an calm,beautiful ,welcoming female voice in my head,telling me that they were not here to hurt me or my girlfriend or anyone on this planet. that the only reason they were here was to learn more about us humans and also to protect us from the greys who do want to hurt us. they also said alot of things that i won't go into at this time. but they did say that we were attractive race of beings,which made me feel proud. by the end of this experience, i felt the safest that i felt in my life. if you would like to know more,i´ll leave my number here. i tired to leave it where it said but it wouldn't go in. so here´s my number: (613)-208-1321
content.summary: There is a lot to be said. a breif description of alien : very tall long blondish hair super pale skin

content.detailedDescription: I already made a report with 2 local mufon investigators approx. 2 yrs ago. not having much luck having my 2 pictures analyzed which were sent to you, hopefully, 2 yrs ago thru the 2 investigators. so i thought i'd try the direct approach. all i want to know is what is in the pictures! these 2 pictures were taken with the same camera which is a moultrie d55 game camera. in the light beam picture, the camera is facing west about 1 ft off the ground. in the second picture that resembles an "eye", the camera is facing east about 3 ft off the ground.
content.summary: Solid looking light beam. doesn't appear to touch ground.

content.detailedDescription: Watching fire works with my kids and family my son age 35 also saw the object wiz by from south to north on crescent beach in delnorte county thought it could be a drone but it was dark how could someone see let alone operate it at that high rate speed it looked to be about 30 feet off the ground and zoomed by about 30 yards in front of us and behind the fireworks we were shooting off don't know if anybody else seen it and i know it was'nt fireworks
content.summary: 3 bright red lights in triangle flying at high rate off speed to the north during fire work show

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was out for a walk before the storm on july 5th to clear my mind. i was a mile from home when i turned around to walk back. then i noticed a hole in the storm clouds to the north. a's i looked i noticed a dark object near/under the hole. thought it was a dark cloud but it drew my attention so i took a few photos with my phone. then continued walking then i looked again. my dog stood behind me whimpering and i saw a flash of light with two straight rainbows on either side. then the dark object was gone. the hole remained in the clouds and i watched the hole close and took pictures of it. as i stood there i felt like i had been heard and warned or rewarded. not sure which yet.
content.summary: I was out for a walk. looked up and saw a hole in the storm clouds with a dark disk shaped object near by the hole. first thought it was a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: So i was watching the news and they were doing a story about some guy doing a stunt for his company. he tied up 120 helium balloons to a lawn chair and flew into the air. at the end of the clip i noticed something in the air. im thinking it might be a stranded balloon but the movement looks a bit fishy in the longer clip they got. also the object looked black and not colorful like the huge ballons. the company is called "all clean natural." parts of the 2:43 min clip is what was shown on the new. they have a 30 sec clip that shows the same object. can someone look these 2 videos over? they have a channel on youtube
content.summary: Saw "ufo" during news

content.detailedDescription: When i was 17 years old, i was on my computer late one night around 11:00 pm when a small window came onto a website i was looking at that said "there is an alien in your closet." i didn't know what to think of it so i closed off my computer and decided to go to bed early. i took one tylenol pm pill, which i've taken before and never had any unusual reactions (i've also been tested and do not have any drug-allergies). after i took the tylenol pm, i turned on my stereo to some light music to help me relax. i lay down in bed and within 20 seconds i began to feel a warm, tingling sensation on top of my head. it startled me, so i sat up and began to run through all of the logical explanations i could think of as to what was happening, only to find none, so i  lay back down. after a few more seconds the tingling came back on my head, so i continued to lay there in curiosity. the tingling then spread down my chest to my abdomen, then through my limbs, toes, and fingers. when it reached my fingers and toes, it began reverberating throughout my body, primarily through my spine. it felt extremely intense, like the feeling of going straight down on a roller-coaster, mixed with a tickling sensation. i struggled to tolerate the sensation as it was so intense, but i held-out due to my curiosity. after about 10 seconds of this sensation, i began to feel like there was something coming out of my chest and i was being pulled into the air. the next thing i know, i'm coming back to consciousness and i feel like i'm being thrown around my room. then, i see a blue orb that's glowing, but not reflecting on anything, and after a moment i realized that i was the blue orb because i was moving with it and within it... i could see from it's perspective while at the same time seeing behind it from a third-person perspective. i was bouncing around my room and could see things i never noticed before, like some dust and cobwebs on a shelf in my room. after bouncing to one side of my room and hitting a wall, i bounced back, over my body (i could see myself in bed), and halted. i then began to materialize into a human form, but not made of organic or solid material. after i was fully materialized, i lowered into my physical body and lay in bed in a trance-like, semi-conscious, state. i shed a tear as i felt that i had experienced something incredibly amazing and possibly spiritual, and then i heard an alternating clicking noise similar to the sound of running your finger across the teeth of a fine-tooth comb. i was startled and opened my eyes, focused on my clock and saw that it was 3:30 a.M. (i had four hours of missing time), and i began thinking of what it could be, as i had never heard this sound before. then all of the sudden in my mind i thought "alien." i sat up to see what it was, and at first i thought it was a child, but upon examination i realized that it was a small gray alien. it was around four feet tall, i couldn't see it's outward color, i couldn't see below it's waist as it was standing behind the foot-board of my bed, it was extremely slender and i doubt it weight any more than 80 pounds. it was staring back at me with it's arms flung out to it's sides, as if it was scared, and we stared at each other for about 30 seconds while all of the human emotions that one feels while encountering a possibly dangerous life-form took place in my mind. i wondered why it was there, what it's intentions were with me, if it had anything to do with my previous experience, and if it would try to harm me. then, to prove to myself that this was real, i slapped my face, pinched my arm, and rubbed my eyes (all of the things people do in movies when they're in disbelief of a witnessed event). after i did that and realized it was real, i focused in on it's face, which was upon a large ovular head with large ovular eyes. i couldn't see a nose or mouth, just the head and eyes. as i gazed into it's black, slanted eyes, i felt like i connected with it and we were feeling each other's fear. it became too much for me to mentally handle, so i fell into bed, pulled the covers over my head, and attempted to scream... but nothing came out. the next thing i knew, i felt it's fingers grace the sheet over my legs, and then it grasped onto them right over my shins and began to pull the sheet down slowly. the sheet began to slide down my face and when it went over my nose, i became extremely frightened and once again pulled it up and screamed for my mom as loud as i could. the next moment felt like it lasted for at least a minute, but it was probably more like 30 seconds. i heard the shuffling of it trying to flee, but i didn't hear any doors or windows open (i keep everything shut while i sleep). my mom finally came into my room and i was so mentally-exhausted from the shock and fear that all i could say to her was "lay with me," and then i passed out. the next morning i was so shocked from what happened that i simply didn't think to document the date of this experience or report it to anyone... i didn't think anyone would believe me anyway. the only people i've told about this are my parents and a few close friends, but i don't think anyone truly believes me that this was real.
content.summary: Had a strange abduction experience, then saw gray alien in my bedroom hours after.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my deck at about 0215am with my wife after having called police for suspicious activity in my neighborhood (they had just left moments before the sighting), i saw a flash of bright white light in the north/slightly northeast sky.  the light looked as it would if somebody had a single bulb, bright white led flashlight at a distance and flashed the button once, but it was high in the sky.

i asked my wife if she saw it and she said no.  then it flashed again in the exact same spot and she saw it this time.  i then grabbed binoculars to try and look closer to the area of sky where the flash came from and was not able to find the area when my wife saw it a second time (which would have  been the third flash).

a minute or so later she went back into the house, and i saw it again, this time much lower on the horizon and closer to directly north.  no sound ever accompanied the flashes and we never saw it again.
content.summary: Multiple flashes of bright white light in north/northest sky

content.detailedDescription:
Around midnight in the middle of winter, i woke up in my parent's living room, as we had been watching an operation show and all fell asleep on our living room couch. i woke up because i had a re-occurring dream that i had often as a child, where i was having tea. as i was sleeping, i reached out my arm (to fill my cup), which is what jolted me awake. i sat up and noticed that there was no sound coming from the tv, or at least i didn't hear any, which was unusual as my father falls asleep with the tv on every night and the volume must be reasonably audible. i also noticed that i didn't hear him snoring, and when i sat up, it didn't wake up my parents (which was also unusual). then, i stood up and without reason, began to walk to our back door. i remember not understanding why i was going outside; my body felt guided to the backyard and also i knew it was too late to go in the backyard alone, and i was also wearing nothing but a petty-coat and it was freezing-cold outside (literally). nevertheless, i stood on the concrete portion of our backyard, directly in front of the door. i was looking down at my feet and thinking about how i could catch a cold for being out there, but i didn't go back inside. i then began to play with a small, pink, satin rose stitched onto the v-neck of my petty-coat when i noticed a reflection of light on the ground, from above my location. i looked up and noticed several solid, stationary lights above my head. it was difficult to tell how high they were, but i would say they were no more than 500 feet above me. i remember thinking that they couldn't be stars because they weren't blinking (i knew a lot about the sky as a child as it had always fascinated me and i commonly star-gazed on a regular basis). then i thought to myself that they couldn't be planets because they were out-of-place, and also too large. after those thoughts had passed, the lights lowered probably about 200 feet, as they went from the size of a pea to the size of a dime from my point of vision. then, they began moving, then multiplying, then connecting by a light like that of a beam, to form shapes. the shapes i remember seeing were a spider, a humming-bird, and a monkey. i didn't know it at the time, but as i got older i realized they were the same exact shapes located at the nazca planes in peru. to continue my memory, the next thing that happened was that they all came together and began lowering as a single point. at this point, the light appeared to be about the size of a house, and then a light came from the center of it and began to engulf my vision. the last thing i recall from that night is the feeling of my feet lifting off the ground as i was gazing into an endless, white light. the next thing i knew, it was morning and i was standing, completely nude, in another location of our backyard (and my petty-coat was nowhere to be found), in the snow. i remember a voice from within (my mind?) telling me to lay down in the snow and pretend that i was playing outside. i couldn't see who was saying this to me and i couldn't even hear a definite voice inside my mind... i cannot explain how i was able to "hear" this message, but only that it came from within myself, but i had a feeling that there was something or someone behind me and i was to not look at them, but only follow it's command. so i lay down in the snow and after a short while, my mom opened her the back window to her bedroom that faced our backyard, and yelled at me, asking what i was doing. i assume she thought i woke up at some point and went into my own room, and had still been asleep. as a result of laying in the snow, i caught pneumonia and ultimately developed asthma. oddly enough, my asthma is most commonly-activated by being physically-active during cold weather. i didn't tell anyone about my experience for years because i was just a child when it happened and didn't understand it. as i grew older and realized it was an abduction experience, i didn't know who to go to and didn't know about "mufon" until just a few years ago. i apologize for not having any solid evidence of this experience, but i was only a child and even if it had crossed my mind to document this event with a camera, my parents didn't own one at the time.

since then i have had another abduction experience and will submit information about that separately, if anyone is interested in it. on a personal note: my only wish out of sharing this information is to help myself, as well as others who have also had genuine abduction experiences, to better-understand what has happened to us. i am hoping that with enough personal accounts, somehow we can fit together the pieces and make sense of all of this. thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Went into backyard and saw several solid lights hovering above me...

content.detailedDescription: I didn't know, but this was a few days (1-2) before the iss feed cut off in june 2015. i wouldn't have thought twice about telling anyone besides my husband, if not for nasa doing that. it was a very quick moment. i was outside smoking, my backyard facing south. i know it was late at night, somewhere between the 11pm-12:30am and there are few lights, any lights, out here. i noticed a bright light in the corner of my eye, by the time my eyes registered the light/movement and moved to the location of it, then spotted the light again, it had moved an incredible distance away. the only reason i know this was, the sky lit up, like a lightening strike, then there was a doughnut shape cloud, with a smaller circle in it, and a pinpoint in the center. then it was gone. the sky was normal. i had to make myself, even though i believe there are things out there, that i just saw this. i sat for about 5 min looking for something else to happen. even though i believe, i was still in shock that i saw this.
content.summary: It was leaving. going back into space

content.detailedDescription: You probably have already seen this or was notified of this but while watching the 1969 apollo lift off on the program called nova "first man on the moon show 42 episode10 i saw a cigar shaped object that looked nearly as long as the rocket pass by it 5 to 15 sec or so after lift off..I believe that particular filming of the lift off was done by a family friend with the last name of socoloff or something close to that..I've seen other films of the lift off in the past and do not remember ever seeing an object passing by the rocket while it was lifting off,it passed by at low altitude long before any stages separated from the rocket..I'm sure you must have seen this or was notified of this before or was explained it was just so noticeable i can't believe i could have been the only one to see this...Please let me know what this was if it was explained..
content.summary: I saw cigar shaped object pass by while watching 1969 apollo lift off

content.detailedDescription: Call phone# for more info.
content.summary: Vessle landed during storm,en taken aboard,viewe things that i had never seen before,aliensliens
